recommender

Class DAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • recommender.DAO

  • public class DAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent and provide access to training and test data set

    • Constructor Detail

      • DAO

        public DAO(java.lang.String trainFileName,
   java.lang.String testFileName,
   java.lang.String delim)
    throws java.io.IOException
        Create a DAO object on top of the training and test data sets.
        Parameters:
        trainFileName - The file containing [user, item, rating] training tuples
        testFileName - The file containing [user, item, rating] test tuples
        delim - Deliminator(s) that separate(s) user, item and rating
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if training or test file could not be opened for reading or read from

        public boolean containsTrainRating(int user,
                          int item)
        Returns:
        true if (@user, @item) has a rating in the training data set, false otherwise

      • getTestRating

        public double getTestRating(int user,
                   int item)
        Returns:
        the rating associated with (@user, @item) in the test data set
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if @user is not present in the test data set or (@user, @item) pair does not exist in the test data set

      • getTestUsers

      • getTrainItems

        public java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Integer> getTrainItems(int user)
        Returns:
        an iterator over all items rated by @user in the training data set

      • getTrainRating

        public double getTrainRating(int user,
                    int item)
        Returns:
        the rating associated with (@user, @item) in the training data set. If @user has not rated @item, 0 is returned
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if @user is not present in the training data

      • getTrainUsers

        public java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.Integer> getTrainUsers()
        Returns:

      • itemMeanDeNormalize

        public void itemMeanDeNormalize()
        Denormalize the transposed training data by adding item mean rating for each rating in the data set.

      • itemMeanNormalize

        public void itemMeanNormalize()
        Normalize the transposed training data by subtracting item mean rating for each rating in the data set.
